text:
@RealCandaceO I want to have faith in Trump BUT:

*No one arrested in spygate
*Media lies and nothing done
*Meat processors closed
*Big business open but not small
*Hillary not prosecuted 
* Gvt. Testing our FREEDOMS!!
*Coronavirus numbers distorted 

WTH MR. PRESIDENT?
